entry.title: Microsoft SMBv3 远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Microsoft SMBv3 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2020-0796

漏洞类型： 缓冲区溢出

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Microsoft Server Message Block 3.1.1 (SMBv3) 在处理某些请求时存在漏洞，远程攻击者可以利用此漏洞执行任意代码。此漏洞需要网络访问SMBv3服务。

产品厂商： Microsoft

产品名称： Microsoft Server Message Block 3.1.1 (SMBv3)

搜索语法： cpe:”cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10_1903”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12271

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Microsoft Server Message Block 3.1.1 (SMBv3) contains a remote code execution caused by mishandling of certain requests in the SMBv3 protocol, letting remote attackers execute arbitrary code, exploit requires network access to SMBv3 service.

Severity: Critical

KEV: True

Shodan Query: cpe:"cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10_1903"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.

产品名称： fortios

影响版本： 7.2.0 <= version <= 7.2.2, 7.0.0 <= version <= 7.0.8, 6.4.0 <= version <= 6.4.10, 6.2.0 <= version <= 6.2.11, version <= 6.0.15

entry.title: PostgreSQL SQL注入到RCE漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： PostgreSQL SQL注入到RCE漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-1094

漏洞类型： SQL注入

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： PostgreSQL中的PQescapeLiteral(), PQescapeIdentifier(), PQescapeString(), 和 PQescapeStringConn()函数对引用语法的中和不当，允许数据库输入提供者在某些使用模式下实现SQL注入。具体来说，SQL注入要求应用程序使用函数结果来构造psql（PostgreSQL交互式终端）的输入。类似地，PostgreSQL命令行实用程序中的引用语法中和不当，当client_encoding为BIG5且server_encoding为EUC_TW或MULE_INTERNAL时，允许命令行参数源实现SQL注入。攻击路径从SQL注入开始，通过WebSocket劫持，最终实现远程代码执行（RCE）。

产品厂商： PostgreSQL

产品名称： PostgreSQL

影响版本： version < 17.3, version < 16.7, version < 15.11, version < 14.16, version < 13.19

来源： https://github.com/B1ack4sh/Blackash-CVE-2025-1094

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • CVE-2025-1094.py
  • README.md

来源概述

CVE-2025-1094 SQL Injection to RCE via WebSocket 🔥

✔️ Description:

Improper neutralization of quoting syntax in PostgreSQL libpq functions PQescapeLiteral(), PQescapeIdentifier(), PQescapeString(), and PQescapeStringConn() allows a database input provider to achieve SQL injection in certain usage patterns. Specifically, SQL injection requires the application to use the function result to construct input to psql, the PostgreSQL interactive terminal. Similarly, improper neutralization of quoting syntax in PostgreSQL command line utility programs allows a source of command line arguments to achieve SQL injection when client_encoding is BIG5 and server_encoding is one of EUC_TW or MULE_INTERNAL. Versions before PostgreSQL 17.3, 16.7, 15.11, 14.16, and 13.19 are affected.

💥 Metrics

CNA: PostgreSQL Base Score: 8.1 🔴 HIGH Vector: CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H

💀 Vulnerability Details:

  • CVE ID: CVE-2025-1094
  • Vulnerable System: PostgreSQL (misconfigured functions)
  • Exploit Path: SQL Injection → WebSocket Hijacking → Remote Code Execution (RCE)

🔔 How It Works:

  1. SQL Injection (SQLi): The attack begins with injecting malicious SQL commands into a vulnerable PostgreSQL endpoint. The payload uses lo_export to read sensitive files from the server.

  2. WebSocket Hijacking: The attacker hijacks an open WebSocket connection and sends a payload to execute the RCE. This triggers a reverse shell connection back to the attacker’s system.

  3. Remote Code Execution (RCE): The reverse shell provides the attacker full control over the server, allowing further exploitation.

📲 PoC (Proof of Concept):

The above SQL payload reads the /etc/passwd file and saves it as /tmp/payload. Once the file is retrieved, the exploit uses WebSocket hijacking to establish a reverse shell.

🌟 How to Use:

  1. Clone the repository:
  1. Modify the following variables in the script:
  • REVERSE_IP: Your attacker’s IP address
  • REVERSE_PORT: The port on which your listener is running
  • TARGET_URL: The vulnerable endpoint to attack
  • WEBSOCKET_URL: The WebSocket URL to hijack

  1. Run the script to exploit the vulnerability and establish a reverse shell.

  2. Start your netcat listener on the specified port:

🌐 Mitigation:

To protect against this vulnerability:

  • Use Prepared Statements: Replace dynamic SQL queries with prepared statements.
  • Validate User Inputs: Always validate and sanitize user inputs to prevent SQL Injection.
  • Restrict PostgreSQL Functions: Limit access to functions like lo_export to trusted users only.
  • Secure WebSocket Connections: Ensure WebSocket connections are authenticated and encrypted.
  • Keep PostgreSQL Updated: Apply the latest security patches and review your PostgreSQL configuration.

☣️ Disclaimer:

This exploit is intended for educational purposes only. Ensure that you have explicit permission before testing any system with this exploit. Unauthorized access to computer systems is illegal.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： PostgreSQL SQL注入到RCE漏洞

  • login and perform the vulnerable request

The attacker must be logged

entry.title: Skyvern SSTI Remote Code Execution
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Skyvern SSTI Remote Code Execution

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： 2025-49619

漏洞类型： 服务端模板注入

漏洞等级： 高危

entry.title: Xorcom CompletePBX Authenticated Command Injection via Task Scheduler
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： 2025-30004

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Xorcom CompletePBX 5.2.35及更早版本中存在一个认证命令注入漏洞，该漏洞存在于任务调度功能中，由于用户输入未经过适当清理，允许攻击者以Web服务器权限执行任意命令。只有超级管理员用户（admin）才有权限触发此漏洞。即使创建具有最大权限的新用户，该漏洞也无法利用。

产品厂商： Xorcom

产品名称： CompletePBX

影响版本： <= 5.2.35

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/blob/2a008c83d1d80ffc246f5dee8dfb2b47eb89b7df/modules%2Fexploits%2Flinux%2Fhttp%2Fxorcom_completepbx_scheduler.rb

entry.title: OpenSSH 内存和CPU耗尽拒绝服务漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： OpenSSH 内存和CPU耗尽拒绝服务漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-26466

漏洞类型： 其他

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： OpenSSH（版本9.5p1至9.9p1）存在一个内存和CPU耗尽的拒绝服务漏洞，攻击者可以通过发送重复的SSH2_MSG_PING数据包（类型192）来利用此漏洞。这种情况发生在认证之前，可能导致服务器由于队列/缓冲区处理不当而锁定。

产品厂商： OpenSSH

产品名称： OpenSSH

影响版本： 9.5p1 <= version <= 9.9p1

来源： https://github.com/mrowkoob/CVE-2025-26466-msf

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • README.md
  • ping_dos.rb

来源概述

CVE-2025-26466 (Metasploit module)

OpenSSH (versions 9.5p1 to 9.9p1) is vulnerable to a memory and CPU exhaustion DoS Attack by sending repeated SSH2_MSG_PING packets (type 192).
This occurs before authentication, and can result in server lockup due to poor queue/buffer handling.

More information about that CVE:

How do I run this script?

Copy .rb file into your ‘modules’ folder, f.e.

/usr/share/metasploit-framework/modules/auxiliary/dos/ssh

Run Metasploit console and search for the module.

References

  • https://blog.qualys.com/vulnerabilities-threat-research/2025/02/18/qualys-tru-discovers-two-vulnerabilities-in-openssh-cve-2025-26465-cve-2025-26466

Disclaimer

I am sharing this just for educational purposes, you shall not use it on infrastructure you are not authorized to.

Issues

That’s my first project shared on GitHub. Feel free to leave comments about it, so I can learn and make it better.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： OpenSSH 内存和CPU耗尽拒绝服务漏洞

漏

entry.title: Apache HTTP Server HTTP Request Smuggling Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Apache HTTP Server HTTP Request Smuggling Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2023-25690

漏洞类型： 服务器端请求伪造

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Apache HTTP Server 版本2.4.0至2.4.55中存在HTTP请求走私漏洞，由于mod_proxy配置中存在RewriteRule或ProxyPassMatch匹配用户提供的URL数据并将其重新插入到代理请求中，攻击者可利用此漏洞绕过访问控制、代理非预期的URL并污染缓存。利用此漏洞需要特定的变量替换配置。

产品厂商： apache

产品名称： http_server

影响版本： 2.4.0 <= version <= 2.4.55

搜索语法： cpe:”cpe:2.3:a:apache:http_server”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/ea459166605e7e6317286d1979492844e9c730f0/http%2Fcves%2F2023%2FCVE-2023-25690.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Apache HTTP Server HTTP Request Smuggli

entry.title: Apache HTTP Server HTTP Request Smuggling Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Apache HTTP Server HTTP Request Smuggling Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2023-25690

漏洞类型： 服务器端请求伪造

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Apache HTTP Server 2.4.0至2.4.55版本中存在HTTP请求走私漏洞，由于mod_proxy配置中存在RewriteRule或ProxyPassMatch漏洞，攻击者可以利用此漏洞绕过访问控制、代理非预期的URL并污染缓存。此漏洞需要特定的配置和变量替换才能被利用。

产品厂商： Apache

产品名称： HTTP Server

影响版本： 2.4.0 <= version <= 2.4.55

搜索语法： cpe:”cpe:2.3:a:apache:http_server”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12455

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Apache HTTP Server versions 2.4.0 through 2.4.55 contain a HTTP Request Smuggling caused by vulnerable mod_proxy configurations with RewriteRule or ProxyPassMatch that match user-supplied URL data and re-insert it into proxied requests, letting attackers bypass access controls, proxy unintended URLs, and poison caches, exploit requires specific configuration with variable substitution.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://github.com/oOCyginXOo/CVE-2023-25690-POC
  • https///github.com:oOCyginXOo/CVE-2023-25690-POC.git
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/60881b97bbc7
  • https://github.com/thanhlam-attt/CVE-2023-25690
  • https///github.com:thanhlam-attt/CVE-2023-25690.git
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/760ecae2eb62
  • https://github.com/dhmosfunk/CVE-2023-25690-POC
  • https///github.com:dhmosfunk/CVE-2023-25690-POC.git
  • https://github.com/tbachvarova/linux-apache-fix-mod_rewrite-spaceInURL

KEV: True

Shodan Query: cpe:"cpe:2.3:a:apache:http_server"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Apache HTTP Server HTTP Request Smuggli

entry.title: CVE-2025-33053 Exploit via Malicious URL File and WebDAV
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： CVE-2025-33053 Exploit via Malicious .URL File and WebDAV

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-33053

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： 该模块通过生成恶意的.URL文件来利用CVE-2025-33053，该文件指向一个受信任的LOLBAS二进制文件，其参数设计用于触发意外行为。可选地，生成一个有效载荷并托管在指定的WebDAV目录上。当受害者打开快捷方式时，它将尝试访问WebDAV路径，可能通过受信任的二进制文件导致远程代码执行。

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/blob/dd51952b67d956cb40350329ff7e3a2d4ad3c7bd/modules%2Fexploits%2Fwindows%2Ffileformat%2Fcve_2025_33053.rb
